content: 1 chain 1 work 12 single_crochet in ring join with slip_stitch 12 single_crochet round 2 chain 4 skip 1 single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet *chain 4 skip 1 single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 6 chain-4 loops round 3 slip_stitch into first loop chain 1 work single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet in same loop *work single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet in next loop repeat from * around join with slip_stitch fasten_off sew flowers in place on front as shown copyright 2017 2008 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes 2
